data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: petrol, diesel, pump. However, the story should not be about going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: Once upon a time, in a tiny village, lived a boy named Petrol. He was the fastest runner in his village, earning him the nickname 'Diesel' because he was as swift and powerful as a diesel engine. One day, a group of bandits attacked their village and stole their only water pump, leaving the villagers in despair. Petrol, with his 'Diesel' speed, chased after the bandits, managing to retrieve the stolen pump. His heroic act not only restored the village's water supply but also earned him the title of 'Petrol Diesel, the Pump Protector'.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: stamp, letter, send. However, the story should not be about putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: Once upon a time, in a town called Stamp, lived a girl named Letter. Unlike other girls, Letter had a unique ability to communicate with animals, and she was cherished by all creatures in Stamp. One day, a flock of birds approached her, chirping anxiously about a young sparrow named Send, who was lost in the dense forest. Bravely, Letter ventured into the forest, her heart filled with determination to bring Send back home. After an adventurous day, Letter returned to Stamp with Send, and the whole town celebrated their return, the news spreading as quickly as a sent letter.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: organ, empire, comply. However, the story should not be about having an organ empire and complying with regulations. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: In the land of Oglethorpe, a peculiar organ made of pure gold was considered the heart of the kingdom. Despite the sprawling empire that surrounded it, this magnificent instrument stood unrivaled in its beauty and significance. One day, a decree was issued by the king: "Whoever can play the golden organ to soothe my troubled mind shall be rewarded handsomely." Yet, the organ was stubborn, refusing to comply and produce a melody for anyone unworthy. In the end, it was the humblest of peasants, with a heart as pure as the organ itself, who played a melody so soothing, it healed not only the king but also the divided empire.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using exactly five sentences and each sentence should contain at least five words. The story must include the following three words: gloom, payment, exist. However, the story should not be about the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment. Please, use simple words and sentence structures.
data.output: Once upon a time, in a world where shadows could speak, there was a young shadow named Gloom. Despite his name, Gloom was quite cheerful, always ready to play hide and seek with the sun. One day, the sun proposed a new game: "Gloom, if you can catch me before sunset, I will let you exist during the daytime." Gloom agreed to the challenge, seeing it as a form of payment for all the fun they had shared. So began the endless chase between Gloom and the sun, reminding us that even in the darkest corners, a playful spirit exists.
